name: System Integration
description: Integrate subsystems into the complete system.

subtasks.name: Prepare Subsystems
subtasks.description: Ensure subsystems are ready for integration.

subtasks.name: Integrate Subsystems
subtasks.description: Combine subsystems into the complete system.

subtasks.name: Test Integrated System
subtasks.description: Test the integrated system for functionality.

subtasks.name: Document System Integration
subtasks.description: Document the system integration process and results.
